Be Curious with Martell's mentoring session and win 2 tickets to a multi-sensory dinner
Martell brings you another guided appreciation of the cognacs with Brand Ambassador Pierre Boyer, ranging from the classic Martell VSOP to the smooth and well-balanced Martell Cordon Bleu and Cordon Bleu Extra. After the tasting, our team of bartenders will introduce you to the art of crafting signature Martell cocktails.
Join the Be Curious mentoring session at:
Bar Des Embiez, Pernod Ricard Malaysia <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Amcorp+Trade+Center/@3.1049091,101.6448602,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x31cc4bfc2000633d:0xaabf9d9c65cda162!8m2!3d3.1049091!4d101.6470489?hl=en]]>
Suite 13A01, Menara PJ
Petaling Jaya
7:30pm, Fri 1st June
RM90
In addition, all attendees get a chance to win 2 tickets to a memorable multi-sensory dinner by Nathalie Gourmet, first of its kind in Malaysia, worth RM 2,300! Indulge in an unforgettable 5 course menu by Chef Nathalie, paired with fine Martell cognacs that will truly excite your senses all night long.
Buy tickets on DiineOut <[[https://diineout.com/event/martell-be-curious-mentoring-session-1-june-2018/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
About the dinner <[[https://www.facebook.com/nathaliegourmetstudio/videos/1951200328254488/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
